articles.title: Ex-UN ambassador breaks down three reasons behind Russia's move to detain US journalist - CNN
articles.description: Former US ambassador to the United Nations Bill Richardson discusses the detainment of American journalist Evan Gershkovich by Russia. #CNN #News
